item.description: This section of the Mid-State Trail is located in the Ware River Watershed Area of Rutland, Hubbardston and Barre and leads to the Barre Falls Dam area ....There is a large wildlife populalation including moose, wild turkey,whitetail deer, fox and a variety of birds...Bring a small picnic lunch if you want, there is a picnic area at the dam with some spectacular scenery . The hike to the dam is aprox. 4 miles...Bad weather cancels out...I will post cancellation by 7 AM Sunday
item.how_to_find_us: Green Toyota Tacoma on the right side of Rt 122 just past Rutland State Park
item.name: Hike Mid-State Trail Rt122 Rutland
